name: AVAssetWriter.Status
desc: Values that indicate the state of an asset writer.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: The asset writer’s status isn’t known.

items.name: case completed
items.desc: The asset writer finishes writing successfully.

items.name: case failed
items.desc: The asset writer fails to write the output file.

items.name: case cancelled
items.desc: The asset writer canceled the writing operation.
